name: Dinorun 3D
description:
Dinorun 3D is a Low Poly graphics conversion of the popular browser game where a powerful T-Rex tries not to get hurt by those evil cacti that stand in his way.

The mechanics are very simple, just touch the screen and our friend will jump, in this way you can help him not to suffer damage. You earn points as you progress.

The difficulty increases little by little. The more distance you travel the obstacles become constant and the speed increases.
